Articles.Content:
Hello,

So i made a Carrier And i cant fore the life of me get it into orbit.

So i was wondering if there is a way to get it into instant orbit or a mod that makes it really easy to get big things into orbet thanks.

I believe that the mod "Hyperedit" Can do this for you.

Edit: I appear to have been "Ninja'd" As you people call it.
Well, It isn't Instant orbit, but editing the Ship can make the launch towers 80 km high, that is at least out of the atmosphere, and it cuts the required Delta V in half.
If it can't fly, it doesn't belong there.
The only non-cheating option known to me is the Orbital Construction mod. It requires you to first bring spare parts up to an orbital station where you can then 'build' your final ship.
